DOC.brief_title: Breast Cancer Screening With MRI Women Aged 50-75 Years With Extremely Dense Breast Tissue : DENSE Trial
DOC.detailed_description: Women high mammographic density four six fold high breast cancer risk woman low mammographic density . At time , sensitivity mammography seriously impaired woman high mammographic density , lead many missed case . Nevertheless , Netherlands high risk group currently screen age 50 75 year mammography . MRI likely lead well detection breast tumor woman high mammographic density , much high sensitivity mammography . The DENSE trial investigate additional value MRI breast cancer screen risk group . Participants extremely dense breast ( ACR4 ) negative mammogram randomize 'additional MRI ' ( n=7,237 ) versus 'current practice ' ( n=28,948 ) .
DOC.criteria: Dutch breast cancer screen participant , age 5075 year > 75 % mammographic density Negative mammographic examination ( BIRADS 1 2 ) Contraindications MRI The presence intracorporeal metal Adverse reaction ( gadoliniumbased ) contrast agent past Severely impaired renal function ( GFR < 40 mL/min ) Pregnant lactate woman Claustrophobia Adiposity ( > 150 kg )
